byline.original: By RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA and JON HURDLE

lead_paragraph: Officials are negotiating with the inmates after four hostages were taken Wednesday morning at the James T. Vaughn Correctional Center. Two were released.
snippet: Officials are negotiating with the inmates after four hostages were taken Wednesday morning at the James T. Vaughn Correctional Center. Two were released....

headline.main: Inmates Take Employees Hostage at a Delaware State Prison
